meanings.definition: A type of cloth or fabric.
meanings.sent1: She used soft tammies to make a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent2: The store sells colorful tammies for sewing projects.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the tammies, unraveling them all over the room.
meanings.sent4: The tammies of memories woven into the fabric of our lives.
meanings.sent5: The tammies felt like a cloud against her skin, gentle and comforting.

meanings.definition: Plural form of 'tammy', a type of hat.
meanings.sent1: The children wore matching tammies to protect themselves from the sun.
meanings.sent2: In the winter, people often wear tammies to keep their heads warm.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his tammies instead of a hat!
meanings.sent4: His head was a treasure trove hidden under layers of tammies.
meanings.sent5: The tammies perched on their heads like colorful birds, adding a touch of whimsy to their outfits.
